attributes.action: MP's to forfeit 2.7% pay rise and reinvest total back into NHS
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned believe that if the UK Government insist on restricting the pay rise of front-line NHS workers to merely 1%, then all MPs should forfeit their own right to a pay rise for the next three years and reinvest this back into public services which are under funded.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
